channel.title: Compile.bat?
channel.description: everytime i click it it says that dumb "javac" error...

item.title: Compile.bat?
item.dc:creator: @Th3_D3vi11 Th3 D3vi11
item.description:
@Th3_D3vi11 wrote:

i edited the compile . bat with
@echo off
COLOR 08
title Working Compile
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

anything wrong? and do i have to do it in run.bat?

Read full topic

item.title: Compile.bat?
item.dc:creator: @floobscaper837 floobscaper837
item.description:
@floobscaper837 wrote:

i can help ya click right click on compile.bat click edit. Now delete what in there and put in

@echo off
COLOR 08
title THIS IS WHERE UR SERVER NAME GOES Client
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06injava.exe” server
pause[br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 07:58:18 PM[/size][hr]do the same thing to run.bat

Read full topic

item.title: Compile.bat?
item.dc:creator: @meiscooldude meiscooldude
item.description:
@meiscooldude wrote:

umm… you need to edit it… (and make sure you have the current version of Jre and Jdk)[br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 07:56:09 PM[/size][hr]LOOK (dont post) in the tut section… they might have something for you… (its a pretty common error)
